content:
Hi, everyone. I forgot to post the details earlier for our IPS Connectathon 27 Track Kickoff and Vaccination Sub-track Tutorials sessions, which are coming up today in just over 2 hours, so here they are:

Meeting Link and Credentials
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87366540954?pwd=dnNmcTVXU3JwdElZS1Q3U2dMS09VZz09

Meeting ID: 873 6654 0954
Passcode: 927795

Whova meeting link
https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202105/Agenda/1673901

We will not be using the Whova linked Zoom for our meeting today! We will re-direct participants to the Zoom meeting link and credentials listed above.

HL7 FHIR Connectathon 27 Whova link and Confluence page
https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202105/
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+05+Connectathon+27

Agenda

Connectathon 27 IPS Track Kickoff (16:00 UTC)

  • Introduction - Aims of FHIR IPS FCAT Session: Rob Hausam
  • Introduction to the HL7 FHIR IPS (Giorgio/Rob)
  • Overview of the proposed scenarios
    • IPS and Vaccinations (Giorgio)
    • Creation and exchange of document: focus on $document; $summary operations (Rob)
  • Overview of the proposed breakout sessions (Rob)
    • IPS on IPA
    • Digitally signed IPS
    • IPS and the unconscious patient
    • IPS â€“ summary vs. complete?
    • IPS "On demand"
  • Tools description
    • Inferno testing environment (MITRE)
    • FHIR servers
    • Terminology servers
    • Show them the Connectathon Manager (ConMan) tool and ask them to record their test system end points (Rob)
  • Point out the Orientation session recording (will be on Confluence)
  • Point out the required Newcomer Orientation - Recording here!
  • Engage partners (including understanding what they can do)
  • Answer questions

UNICOM Preparatory Tutorials for IPS Vaccination Sub-track (17:00 UTC)

  • Information on COVID vaccines to be used for the testing of the IPS in the vaccination workflow, Robert Van der Stichele
  • Portfolio of identifiers - (PhPID, MPID, GTIN, Batch numbers) - Pilot Vaccine Product Identification (WHO-UMC) Speaker: Malin Fladvad / Christian Hay
  • Terminology resources for COVID-19 Vaccine Information, GPS (Peter Williams and Suzy Roy for SNOMED)
  • IHE Uniform barcoding process and IPS (IHE services, Karima) - expect to reschedule this for a different time
  • WHO Smart Vaccination Certificates and the IPS (Derek Ritz)
  • European Initiative on Digital Green Certificate: Technical Specs and relation to IPS (Christof Gessner)
  • Approach and architecture for the vaccination registration for Covid-19 in Belgium: Successes and Pitfalls (Dominique Dejonckheere)

IPS Specifications for the Connectathon

  • STU 1 (1.0.0)
    • http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/
  • CI build 'connectathon' branch
    • http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/branches/connectathon/index.html

Is the zoom recording for this available?
Note we did not use Whova so https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202105/Agenda/1673901 recording link does not work (which I confirmed with Bryn Evans)

@Paul Denning Yes, thanks for the inquiry and reminder, and I'm sure that recording is available (I'll verify that). I am thinking that I may have already made that available, but I may not have actually done that yet. Either way, once I have it I will go ahead and post it here.

Apologies for taking a while, but here is the link for the kickoff and tutorials: https://us02web.zoom.us/rec/share/28jfiPI7m3WhnQu7yvU9elBK61JlWm7YisiQ8MAg7yyo2cEnaLQFWde1IPN_Al1I.2MOXK2aJ9ytXG8vn
and the passcode: 4F@1&ubm
I will go ahead and make sure that this is also included on our Connectathon 27 IPS track Confluence page (as it should have been already).
@Paul Denning @Elliot Silver
